xhtml:p.xhtml:span: 也可以不添加，若不添加，则不需要sun-jaxws.xml文件

notes.plain:
1、添加依赖jar包 <!-- 用于和spring集成使用 --> <dependency> <groupId>org.jvnet.jax-ws-commons.spring</groupId> <artifactId>jaxws-spring</artifactId> <version>1.8</version> <exclusions> <exclusion> <groupId>org.springframework</groupId> <artifactId>spring</artifactId> </exclusion> <exclusion> <groupId>org.springframework</groupId> <artifactId>spring-core</artifactId> </exclusion> <exclusion> <groupId>org.springframework</groupId> <artifactId>spring-context</artifactId> </exclusion> <exclusion> <groupId>com.sun.xml.stream.buffer</groupId> <artifactId>streambuffer</artifactId> </exclusion> <exclusion> <groupId>org.jvnet.staxex</groupId> <artifactId>stax-ex</artifactId> </exclusion> </exclusions> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>com.sun.xml.ws</groupId> <artifactId>jaxws-rt</artifactId> <version>2.2.6</version> </dependency>
2、修改web.xml a、添加linstener 注意：添加在spring linstener之后，也可以不添加，若不添加，则不需要sun-jaxws.xml文件 <listener> <listener-class>com.sun.xml.ws.transport.http.servlet.WSServletContextListener</listener-class> </listener>
b、添加servlet <servlet> <servlet-name>Hello</servlet-name> <!-- <servlet-class>com.sun.xml.ws.transport.http.servlet.WSServlet</servlet-class> --> <servlet-class>com.sun.xml.ws.transport.http.servlet.WSSpringServlet</servlet-class> <load-on-startup>2</load-on-startup> </servlet> <servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>Hello</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/HelloService</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping> <servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>Hello</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/Hello2Service</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping>

xhtml:p.xhtml:span: name 可选，the name of the wsdl:portType
serviceName the name of the wsdl:service
targetNamespace 接口类要添加@WebService注释，并指定其targetNamespace，一定要与实现类保持一致
portName the name of the wsdl:port

html.xhtml:p: 不能添加的WebService注释属性有：
生成wsdl 和 xsd 文件

notes.plain:
https://jax-ws-commons.java.net/jaxws-maven-plugin/
生成wsdl 和 xsd 文件 clean compile jaxws:wsgen
<plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>jaxws-maven-plugin</artifactId> <!-- <executions> <execution> <phase>compile</phase> <goals> <goal>wsgen</goal> </goals> </execution> </executions> --> <configuration> <genWsdl>true</genWsdl> <resourceDestDir>src/main/resources/wsdl2</resourceDestDir> <sei>com.lejingw.apps.ws2.Hello2WsService</sei> <keep>true</keep> <!-- <sourceDestDir>src/main/java</sourceDestDir> --> <verbose>true</verbose> <xnocompile>true</xnocompile> </configuration> </plugin>

topic.title: 3、或者临时发布web service，采用客户端的形式生成wsdl文件

xhtml:p.xhtml:span: 此时需要将xsd中的内容，手工添加到wsdl的xml文件中

topic.title: 4、在WEB-INF下创建sun-jaxws.xml文件（如无linstener，则可不要）

html.xhtml:p: 如果使用jax-ws自己来管理web service bean
则sun-jaxws.xml中一定要设置内容，并和servlet中的内容对应
通过http查看xsd时，会发生xsd文件无法找到的异常
此时可以通过把xsd中的内容添加wsdl的xml文件中即可

notes.plain:
如果使用jax-ws自己来管理web service bean --com.sun.xml.ws.transport.http.servlet.WSServlet 则sun-jaxws.xml中一定要设置内容，并和servlet中的内容对应 <endpoint implementation="com.lejingw.apps.ws2.Hello2WsService" name="Hello" url-pattern="/Hello2Service"/> 通过http查看xsd时，会发生xsd文件无法找到的异常 此时可以通过把xsd中的内容添加wsdl的xml文件中即可
<servlet> <servlet-name>Hello</servlet-name> <!-- <servlet-class>com.sun.xml.ws.transport.http.servlet.WSServlet</servlet-class> --> <servlet-class>com.sun.xml.ws.transport.http.servlet.WSSpringServlet</servlet-class> <load-on-startup>2</load-on-startup> </servlet>

<beans xmlns="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:ws="http://jax-ws.dev.java.net/spring/core" xmlns:wss="http://jax-ws.dev.java.net/spring/servlet" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans http://www.springframework.org/schema/beans/spring-beans-3.0.xsd http://jax-ws.dev.java.net/spring/core http://jax-ws.dev.java.net/spring/core.xsd http://jax-ws.dev.java.net/spring/servlet http://jax-ws.dev.java.net/spring/servlet.xsd">
<wss:binding url="/Hello2Service"> <wss:service> <ws:service bean="#hello2WsService"> <ws:handlers> <ref bean="authValidationHandler"/> </ws:handlers> <ws:metadata><value>/WEB-INF/wsdl2/hello2.xsd</value></ws:metadata> </ws:service> </wss:service> </wss:binding> <bean id="authValidationHandler" class="com.lejingw.apps.handler.AuthValidationHandler"/> <bean id="hello2WsService" class="com.lejingw.apps.ws2.Hello2WsService" />

clean compile jaxws:wsimport
<plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>jaxws-maven-plugin</artifactId> <executions> <execution> <phase>compile</phase> <goals> <goal>wsimport</goal> </goals> </execution> </executions> <configuration> <wsdlDirectory>src/main/resources/META-INF/wsdl3</wsdlDirectory> <wsdlFiles> <wsdlFile>hello3.wsdl</wsdlFile> </wsdlFiles> <!-- <wsdlLocation>http://example.com/mywebservices/*</wsdlLocation> <wsdlUrls> <wsdlUrl>http://localhost:8080/lstzsb/Hello2Service?wsdl</wsdlUrl> </wsdlUrls> <packageName>com.lejingw.apps.ws3</packageName> --> <keep>true</keep> <sourceDestDir>src/main/java</sourceDestDir> <verbose>true</verbose> <xnocompile>true</xnocompile> </configuration> </plugin>

xhtml:p.xhtml:span: 2、除了生成的接口类外，若舍弃其他生成的类
则要调整接口中的各个方法上输入、输出信息转换类属性
3、调整xsd中的schema根节点的elementFormDefault属性值为unqualified

notes.plain:
注意： 1、wsdlLocation指向WEB-INF/wsdl31目录中的wsdl文件 2、除了生成的接口类外，若舍弃其他生成的类 则要调整接口中的各个方法上输入、输出信息转换类属性 即删除@RequestWrapper注释中的className属性 3、调整xsd中的schema根节点的elementFormDefault属性值为unqualified <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <xsd:schema xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://ws3.apps.lejingw.com" xmlns:tns="http://ws3.apps.lejingw.com" elementFormDefault="unqualified">
@WebService(endpointInterface="com.lejingw.apps.ws31.IHello3WsService", portName="Hello3WsServicePort", serviceName="Hello3WsService", targetNamespace="http://ws3.apps.lejingw.com", wsdlLocation="/WEB-INF/wsdl31/hello3.wsdl" )

<wss:binding url="/Hello3Service"> <wss:service> <ws:service bean="#hello3WsService"> <ws:metadata><value>/WEB-INF/wsdl31/hello3.xsd</value></ws:metadata> </ws:service> </wss:service> </wss:binding>
<bean id="hello3WsService" class="com.lejingw.apps.ws31.Hello3WsService" />

topic.title: 1、客户端应用添加wsimport的maven插件，生成web service 源代码

notes.plain: <plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>jaxws-maven-plugin</artifactId> <executions> <execution> <phase>compile</phase> <goals> <goal>wsimport</goal> </goals> </execution> </executions> <configuration> <!-- <wsdlDirectory>src/resources/META-INF/wsdl2</wsdlDirectory> <wsdlFiles> <wsdlFile>hell2.wsdl</wsdlFile> <wsdlFile>${basedir}/src/mywsdls/c.wsdl</wsdlFile> </wsdlFiles> <wsdlLocation>http://example.com/mywebservices/*</wsdlLocation> --> <wsdlUrls> <wsdlUrl>http://localhost:8080/lstzsb/Hello2Service?wsdl</wsdlUrl> </wsdlUrls> <keep>true</keep> <sourceDestDir>src/main/java</sourceDestDir> <packageName>com.lejingw.apps.ws3</packageName> <verbose>true</verbose> <xnocompile>true</xnocompile> </configuration> </plugin>

topic.title: 2、编写测试文件测试web service是否可以调用成功

notes.plain:
<!-- 使用spring来注入一个ws的client -->
	<bean id="hello2WsService" class="org.springframework.remoting.jaxws.JaxWsPortProxyFactoryBean">
	    <property name="serviceInterface" value="com.lejingw.apps.ws3.Hello2WsService"/>
	    <property name="wsdlDocumentUrl" value="http://localhost:8080/lstzsb/Hello2Service?wsdl"/>
	    <property name="namespaceUri" value="http://ws2.apps.lejingw.com"/>
	    <property name="serviceName" value="Hello2WsService"/>
	    <property name="portName" value="Hello2WsServicePort"/>
        <property name="handlerResolver" ref="mySOAPHandlerResolver"/>
	</bean>

MySOAPHandlerResolver.java

import java.util.ArrayList;
import java.util.List;

import javax.xml.ws.handler.Handler;
import javax.xml.ws.handler.HandlerResolver;
import javax.xml.ws.handler.PortInfo;

import org.springframework.stereotype.Service;

@Service("mySOAPHandlerResolver")
@SuppressWarnings("rawtypes")
public class MySOAPHandlerResolver implements HandlerResolver {
	private List<Handler> handlerList;
	
	public MySOAPHandlerResolver(){
		handlerList = new ArrayList<Handler>();
		handlerList.add(new LicenseInfoHandler());
	}

	@Override
	public List<Handler> getHandlerChain(PortInfo portInfo) {
		return handlerList;
	}

}
<bindingDirectory>src/main/resources/META-INF/wsdl3</bindingDirectory> <bindingFiles> <bindingFile>binding.xml</bindingFile> </bindingFiles>

html.xhtml:p: 我们把HelloService文件打开，可以看到两行：
有两行，尤其是Url url=这一行，千万不要漏改了。

notes.plain:
<plugin> <groupId>org.codehaus.mojo</groupId> <artifactId>jaxws-maven-plugin</artifactId> <!-- <executions> <execution> <phase>compile</phase> <goals> <goal>wsimport</goal> </goals> </execution> </executions> --> <configuration> <wsdlUrls> <wsdlUrl>http://localhost:8080/lstzsb/Hello2Service?wsdl</wsdlUrl> </wsdlUrls> <keep>true</keep> <verbose>true</verbose> <xnocompile>true</xnocompile> <bindingDirectory>src/main/resources/META-INF/wsdl3</bindingDirectory> <bindingFiles> <bindingFile>binding.xml</bindingFile> </bindingFiles> </configuration> </plugin>
如果使用jdk自带的wsimport工具 wsimport -keep –b binding.xml -d bin -s src wsdl/HelloService.wsdl
我们把HelloService文件打开，可以看到两行： file:/D:/workspace/JaxWSClient/wsdl/HelloService.wsdl 把它们改成： http://localhost:9090/JaxWSSample/HelloService?wsdl 有两行，尤其是Url url=这一行，千万不要漏改了。

html.xhtml:p: 3、在binding中的对应operation的input中添加输入参数

notes.plain:
1、添加xsd:element <xsd:element name="licenseInfo" type="xsd:string"/>
2、添加message <wsdl:message name="licenseInfo"> <wsdl:part name="licenseInfo" element="tns:licenseInfo"/> </wsdl:message>
3、在binding中的对应operation的input中添加输入参数 <wsdl:binding name="hello3WsSOAP" type="tns:IHello3WsService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="sayHello"> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header use="literal" part="licenseInfo" message="tns:licenseInfo"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding>

html.xhtml:p: 添加 header内容作为方法的传入参数
public QName(String namespaceURI, String localPart, String prefix)
namespaceURI - Namespace URI of the QName
localPart - local part of the QName
2、在根据wsdl自动生成的web service SEI实现类中添加HandlerChain注释
* This class was generated by the JAX-WS RI.

notes.plain:
1、handler.xml放置于resources根目录下
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <handler-chains xmlns="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/javaee"> <handler-chain> <handler> <handler-name>licenseInfoHandler</handler-name> <handler-class>com.lejingw.apps.handler.LicenseInfoHandler</handler-class> </handler> </handler-chain> </handler-chains>
2、在根据wsdl自动生成的web service SEI实现类中添加HandlerChain注释 方便测试 /** * This class was generated by the JAX-WS RI. * JAX-WS RI 2.1.3-b02- * Generated source version: 2.1 * */ @WebServiceClient(name = "Hello3WsService", targetNamespace = "http://ws3.apps.lejingw.com", wsdlLocation = "http://localhost:8080/lstzsb/Hello3Service?wsdl") @HandlerChain(file="handlers.xml") public class Hello3WsService extends Service

topic.title: 2、修改接口和实现类，添加异常处理

notes.plain:
1、添加xsd:element <xsd:element name="Hello3WsException" type="tns:Hello3WsException"/> <xsd:complexType name="Hello3WsException"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="message" type="xsd:string"/> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType>
2、添加wsdl:message <wsdl:message name="Hello3WsException"> <wsdl:part name="fault" element="tns:Hello3WsException"/> </wsdl:message>
3、添加portType <wsdl:portType name="IHello3WsService"> <wsdl:operation name="sayHello"> <wsdl:input message="tns:sayHello"/> <wsdl:output message="tns:sayHelloResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="Hello3WsException" message="tns:Hello3WsException"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType>
4、添加binding <wsdl:binding name="hello3WsSOAP" type="tns:IHello3WsService"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="sayHello"> <wsdl:input> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header use="literal" part="licenseInfo" message="tns:licenseInfo"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="Hello3WsException"> <soap:fault name="Hello3WsException" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding>

html.xhtml:p: 3、对特定的web service 调用请求验证

notes.plain:
1、创建handler类，继承javax.xml.ws.handler.soap.SOAPHandler<SOAPMessageContext>
2、创建HandlerResolver类，实现接口javax.xml.ws.handler.HandlerResolver
3、修改配置文件 <bean id="hello3WsService" class="org.springframework.remoting.jaxws.JaxWsPortProxyFactoryBean"> <property name="serviceInterface" value="com.lejingw.apps.ws31.IHello3WsService"/> <property name="wsdlDocumentUrl" value="http://localhost:8080/lstzsb/Hello3Service?wsdl"/> <property name="namespaceUri" value="http://ws3.apps.lejingw.com"/> <property name="serviceName" value="Hello3WsService"/> <property name="portName" value="Hello3WsServicePort"/> <property name="handlerResolver" ref="mySOAPHandlerResolver"/> </bean>
4、或者在web service类上添加@HandlerChain(file="handlers.xml")
